data.title: Hepatology
data.text:
In the March 2020 issue of Hepatology, in the erratum for “Changes in GUT Microbiome Associated with Nash Progression in a Diet Induced Animal MODEL of Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis (NASH),” (volume 68, issue S1, pages 758A‐759A; https://doi.org/10.1002/hep.30257), by Jasmine Amirzadegan et al., there is an error in the referenced doi. It should read as 10.1002/hep.30257 instead of 10.1002/hep.30941.

We apologize for this mistake.

Hepatology. 71(5):1890, May 2020.

In the October 2018 supplement issue of Hepatology, in abstract 1317 titled “Changes in GUT Microbiome Associated with Nash Progression in a Diet Induced Animal MODEL of Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis (NASH),” (volume 68, issue S1, pages 758A‐759A; doi: 10.1002/hep.30257), by Jasmine Amirzadegan et al., there is an error in the first author name. Her name should read as “Jasmine Amirzadegan.”

We apologize for this mistake.

[Correction added on March 30, 2020, after first online publication: The DOI was corrected.]
